reviews.review:
If you don't care about graphics, this game is one of the best mechanics wise.

Buy it, also nice to combine with Gmod for extra textures~!*
*(Note: almost all servers for GMOD require CS:S textures)
Самый лучший шутер в который я играл,обязательно купите!!!)

This game is like a COD  (Call of Duty) if you only play COD games.. The mods in the game is what makes it interesting personally. I am always on the servers with the zombies mod and I spend my day having fun killing zombies. This game is very fun and personally, I would recommend this to all my friends. It even has most of the weapons that would catch my attention in  FPS games. My rate 10/10!
старая добрая КСС, в которую многие играли еще в компьютерных залах!!!))
Отличная сетевая игра. Я считаю что она одна из лучших

Las gráficas lo hacen un juego exquisito. Aprovechando el motor Source que sin duda empezó bien, trayendonos la secuela del que fue el juego del año en su tiempo, viene ahora como vino la primera vez, CS: Source. Si ya quedaste marcado por su predecesor y te gustan los juegos con alta gamma de gráficos este debe estar en tu biblioteca.

Its good, but obviously Call of Duty is the best. I mean COD lets you camp in safety, and allows you to noob tube. I mean if you have skills at fps I guess u can play this game. But COD is where its at, no skill needed = BEST GAME!
Really great game, just a shame it's dead now. The best cs in my opinion!
Отличная игра! Хорошо подходит для того чтобы успокоить нервы :3Ё

Shoot. Good shoot. Very good shoot.

Shoot/10

Todo un clásico del genero “shooter”. Ya han pasado muchos años y ha envejecido muy bien. Pase muchas horas durante años jugando al CS:S. 

No he probado el nuevo CS y la verdad es que tampoco tengo muchas ganas de hacerlo, prefiero recordar con cariño este juego.
Игра нормальная. Геймплек хороший. Никогда не надоест.
This game is a classic. What more can I say?
I basically just got this game for Gmod, but then I was like one day I should try it. And it's actually pretty damn amazing. IT'S OVER 9000 out of 10.
jogo muito bommapa de_dust2 dele é o melhor mapa de todos os CSs
Its probably one of the most realistic games ever, x400,000 better than cod. Sound is VERY important in this game and tactics, one of the best games ever. but unfortunatly there is csgo

Very balanced mechanics with gameplay different enough from it's original counterpart that makes it fun.  It looks amazing on the source engine and feels very smooth.  Fast twitch responses makes this game very hard to get into if you are new, but don't give up and you'll eventually fall in love.  A huge community makes this game great for friends and also clans if you so wish, packed with lots of user made content and mods like zombie mods, to surf mods, and even jailbreak mods.  I'd strongly recommend this game to fans of counterstrike or even fans of shooters in general.  Or casual players looking for a fun time can enjoy a large selection of servers as well.
Хорошее усовершенствование старой доброй CS. Графика намного лучше, а гемплэй ничуть не изменился. Игра для тех, кто играет не ради цифр и статистики.
Эта игра обязана быть у каждого!

Taktischer Shooter auf Basis von CS 1.6 mit verbesserter Grafik und Skins.
Garantiert Spielspaß!

Кусок говна


32 ебучих школьников с вх из 32 человек на сервере
One of the best games i eva played in my entiere life better than csgoo
this game was a great source of amusment for hours
muy buen juego y muy util si tiene el garry's mod
Eu gostei muito desse jogo e acho que muitas pessoas vao gostar
Ништяк! Под Линуском(Ubuntu 14.04) только в путь =)
Best game ever guy it if you can handle the awesomness of this

i recomend this game to anyone who likes the source engine.
this is my favorite counter-strike becouse of the engine, the weapons, the realism, and fast paced action. unlike other fps's this game has no aim down sights on guns, no sprint, but does hav dstruction becaus of the source engine. if you are someone like me you would love this game

It's not CS:1.6, and it's certainly not CS:1.5, but if you can muscle your way past the Source engine's lumbering mechanics after spending thousands of hours with the GoldSrc engine's snappy responses in CS:1.6 and CS:1.5, then you'll still have some fun with CS:S. That is, so long as you don't mind random bullet spray patterns. All your muscle memory from controlling the m4 and ak in previous versions of the game counts for nothing here. If precision is an absolute must for you, then get used to the AWP and get used to counter-strafing.
1.6 z lepszą grafiką i gorszym systemem strzelania, nie polecam.
Polecam jeśli ktoś chce sie oderwac na chwile od rzeczywistości i wyżyć sie na lapsach
Good game, 9/10 would be in it.
After 1.6, a true classic. Enough said. Always fun.
A perfect game to spend time when you don't know what to do, easy to play and very fun
Эта игра подойдет и олдфагам,и ньюфагам.
就是 为了他 来的
Excelent jeux plein de mod différent qui fait passer des heures délirante entre amis
Bei diesem Spiel gibt es nichts zu bemängeln. 10/10

Ich kann dieses Spiel nur Empfehlen .

Ich habe viele schöne Stunden in diesem Spiel verbracht!!!
Jogo épico, nunca irei cansar de jogar o eterno Counter-Strike: Source

Hacker & cheater central.

Wouldnt recommend this game to anyone, every server is full to the brim with modders, cheaters, hackers, makes the game so pointless. Nearly everyone you play against has immortality hack on. Seriously disappointed in Valve for allowing this to happen to such a legendary game back in its time.... 1/10
This is better than GO, trust me
this sucks just as hard as it did 3 years ago
